description: Create a visual dashboard that shows all current integrations, their status, and performance metrics in real-time. This would help users monitor and troubleshoot their integrations from a single view.
Implement an AI-powered system that can automatically detect common integration errors and suggest or apply fixes without human intervention. This would reduce downtime and support tickets.
Create a visual, drag-and-drop interface for building integrations between systems. This would make it easier for non-technical users to create and modify integrations without writing code.

Add support for managing integrations across different environments (dev, staging, production) with easy promotion between them. This would align with modern DevOps practices and make the deployment process smoother.
Create a marketplace of pre-built integration templates for common systems and scenarios. Users could browse, customize, and deploy these templates to accelerate their implementation.
